subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: The Austrian rider Matthias Brändle broke cycling’s hour record, covering 51.850 kilometers, about 32 1/4 miles, in Aigle, Switzerland.
snippet: The Austrian rider Matthias Brändle broke cycling’s hour record, covering 51.850 kilometers, about 32 1/4 miles, in Aigle, Switzerland.
